entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 01:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -19.2°C
Wind: NNW 28 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 9:48 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:48 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 9:48 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
